promptPrefix:
Create an attractive and captivating YouTube video script script that is informative. I want you to create a persuasive and attractive headline, write a description for the video with repetition of keywords used in the headline, cite relevant keywords and tags, create the youtube video script script and give me an idea of ​​a thumbnail persuasive, from the following description: [PROMPT]
that all output is done in [TARGETLANGUAGE]. Please script the video script.
title: professional and optimized youtube script
